author: Patsy McGarry
title: Irish church leaders invite all to home-based prayer on Sunday
description: No public holy week or Easter ceremonies in cathedrals or churches due to coronavirus
content: The leaders of Irelands main churches have invited people to take part in prayers throughout the island on Palm Sunday, 3pm-4pm. They have also paid tribute to everyone in the health and social care services and those on the front line, for their courage in t… [+2208 chars]
